about.title: About UploadSoul
about.subtitle: Building the World's Leading Digital Emotional Companion Platform
about.intro: UploadSoul is a technology startup registered in Vancouver, Canada, dedicated to building the world's leading digital emotional companion platform based on artificial intelligence and holographic virtual technology. We provide comprehensive, immersive emotional companionship solutions for users.
about.vision: With 'Digital Immortality' and 'Holographic Emotional Companion' as our core competitiveness, UploadSoul has created a new emotional companionship ecosystem by integrating cutting-edge AI, big data, and VR immersive technology. With precise market positioning, advanced technology system, and international strategic layout, we are confident in achieving high-speed growth and capturing a significant share of the global emotional companionship market in the coming years.
about.techInnovationDesc: Integrating cutting-edge AI, big data, and VR immersive technology to create a unique digital emotional ecosystem
about.globalLayoutDesc: International strategic layout, committed to serving global users
about.investmentDesc: Currently conducting angel round financing, looking forward to working with you to jointly promote the new era of digital emotions and achieve win-win development.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: UploadSoul values your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: The information we collect includes but is not limited to: personal information (name, email, contact details, etc.), usage data (access records, interaction data, etc.), uploaded content (photos, videos, text, etc.), and device information (device model, operating system, etc.).

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.content: We use the collected information to: provide and improve our services, personalize user experience, send service notifications and updates, prevent fraud and ensure security.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement various security measures to protect your information: data encryption for storage and transmission, access control and permission management, regular security audits, and employee confidentiality training.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information: access and view personal information, correct or update personal information, delete personal information, and withdraw consent.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions or suggestions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:
Email: privacy@uploadsoul.com
Address: Vancouver, Canada
